articles.description: As New Zealand denied any board division over the future of Super Rugby, Australian power brokers vowed to reject a limited presence for Australian teams.
articles.content:
"If we're building up to the [2023] World Cup and rebuilding Australian rugby we need the maximum amount of teams in the competition, including our friends at the Force.

articles.title: We're good to go! Victoria A-League clubs cleared to go to NSW - FTBL Australia
articles.description: The A-League restart will go ahead as planned with three clubs stranded in coronavirus-hit Victoria granted government exemptions to travel to NSW.
articles.content:
The three A-League clubs stranded in coronavirus-hit Victoria have been granted government exemptions to travel to NSW.
Melbourne Victory, Melbourne City and Western United are still in Melbourne af… [+3281 chars]

articles.title: NRL 2020: Broncos v Bulldogs round nine match preview - NRL.COM
articles.description: Things are dire at the Broncos and the noise will only get louder until they snap a six-match losing streak.
articles.content:
